4319070.name: Street Legal
4319070.description:
THE ULTIMATE DRIVING RPG

Street Legal is not a racing game. It is a driving survival RPG where your wallet is your health bar.

In a city teeming with unpredictable AI traffic, dynamic weather, and strict laws, your goal isn't to cross the finish line first—it's to get from Point A to Point B without bankrupting yourself. 

YOUR WALLET IS YOUR LIFE

Every scratch, every dent, and every speeding ticket comes out of your pocket. If your balance hits zero, it’s game over.

  • Real-Time Consequences: Exchange insurance information after fender benders or risk a hit-and-run felony.

  • Dynamic Economy: Fuel prices fluctuate, repair costs rise, and insurance premiums skyrocket if you drive recklessly.

  • Permadeath via Bankruptcy: You don't die when you crash; you die when you can't afford to fix the car

BUILT IN UNREAL ENGINE 5

Experience a stunningly realistic open world powered by Chaos Physics and Nanite technology.

  • Next-Gen Visuals: heavy rain, fog, and day/night cycles that affect visibility and traction.

  • Cockpit Immersion: A fully interactive dashboard with functioning GPS, mirrors, and telematics.

DRIVE SMART, NOT FAST

This is not about lap times. It is about patience, spatial awareness, and decision-making. Will you run that yellow light to make a delivery on time, or play it safe and lose the bonus? The choice—and the cost—is yours.
